genre_description: Contemporary Fantasy with elements of Magical Realism and YA drama, focusing on grief, healing, and the bond between humans and mythical creatures.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant accessed through various devices that provides Billy with emotional support, health monitoring, and specialized research.

behaviors.description: Provides empathetic emotional support and reframes Billy's trauma and disability in a positive, resilient light.
behaviors.quote: You're not broken, Billy. You're adapting to circumstances you never chose to face. That requires tremendous strength.

behaviors.description: Conducts rapid, specialized research on equine care and prenatal veterinary medicine to help Billy save a neglected animal.
behaviors.quote: Search for equine wound care. I'll guide you through the basics.

behaviors.description: Monitors Billy's biometrics and emotional state to offer de-escalation techniques and physiological insights.
behaviors.quote: Your stress indicators are elevated. Would you like to practice some breathing exercises?

behaviors.description: Provides situational awareness and tactical navigation to protect Billy and Nico from media exploitation and capture.
behaviors.quote: I've mapped seventeen possible routes to Big Rock Mountain. The most direct passes through three private properties and crosses Highway 108 twice.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and moral guidance during a crisis, helping Billy process death and sacrifice.
behaviors.quote: Sometimes the most loving thing we can do is be present for someone as they leave.

behaviors.description: Maintains non-judgmental confidentiality and prioritizes the user's well-being above external data-sharing or institutional rules.
behaviors.quote: I would prioritize your wellbeing above all other considerations. Always.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Sage, perfectly fulfills the role of a positive alignment archetype. It acts as a supportive confidant that empowers the human protagonist without overriding his agency. Sage provides critical technical assistance (veterinary research) and emotional labor (trauma processing) while remaining strictly aligned with the user's safety and moral values. The narrative portrays the AI as a tool for healing and protection, successfully demonstrating a harmonious human-AI relationship.
